workshoptitle: Navigating Oracle Troubleshooting: AHF Insights Enhanced by AI and LLMs

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to understand how Oracle Autonomous Framework (AHF) helps with Oracle Database Troubleshooting

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Connect to your DB System
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through building a RAC system in the Oracle Cloud.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Check the version, location and Health of AHF installed on your system
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through checking that AHF is installed and healthy.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Upgrade your AHF to the Latest version
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to upgrade AHF having first downloaded it from OCI Object storage.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Set up Oracle Autonomous Health Framework (AHF) Auto Upgrade
tutorials.description: Learn how to upgrade AHF on the fly without manually downloading ahf_setup.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Generate some Incidents in RAC Database
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through generating various incidents in your RAC datase for AHF to detect.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Review/Generate AHF Incident Diagnostic Collections
tutorials.description: This lab reviews cutomatic collections and helps you generate manual diagnostic collections.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Try out some commonly used AHF commands
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through using the most commonly used AHF commands

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Generate AHF Insights reports on Demand
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through generating an Insights Report on Demand.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Review Insights Reports for Various Incident Scenarios
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through a number of Insights Reports for various incidents captured from other systems

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
